sentences.en: "Why don't you borrow your sister's car?" said Cassandra stiffly.
sentences.cn: “你为什么不借用你姐姐的车呢？”卡桑德拉生硬地说道。

sentences.en: Finally its mouth gaped and its pink - white tongue shot out stiffly.
sentences.cn: 最后它张着大口,红里透白的舌头直挺挺地吐了出来.

sentences.en: He climbed stiffly from the Volkswagen.
sentences.cn: 他浑身酸痛地从大众轿车里爬出来。

sentences.en: He got out of bed stiffly.
sentences.cn: 他手脚不灵便地起了床.

sentences.en: Just then the old man strode stiffly into the courtyard.
sentences.cn: 正在这时候,老头子硬挺挺地走到院子里.

sentences.en: Lucy could feel his ears standing stiffly upright. She was terribly afraid.
sentences.cn: 露西的手感到他的耳朵高高竖起. 她心里非常害怕.

sentences.en: Moira sat stiffly upright in her straight-backed chair.
sentences.cn: 莫伊拉直挺挺地坐在她的直背靠椅上。

sentences.en: She held up her hand stiffly.
The money mechanism began to work stiffly and inaccurately.
sentences.cn: 贷币机构开始周转不灵和不准确了.
三位官员拘谨地挥了挥手.

sentences.en: The two of them just stood there rather stiffly and said nothing.
sentences.cn: 吴为成他们直挺挺地站在那里,不作声.

sentences.en: Then the figure moved. Stiffly and slowly, it came down the steps.
sentences.cn: 这时那人影开始移动了, 它僵硬地缓缓走下台阶.

sentences.en: They greeted each other stiffly, without affection.
sentences.cn: 他们生硬地打着招呼，没有一丝爱意。

sentences.en: When he distinguished Anna, he involuntarily frowned, nodded stiffly.
sentences.cn: 当他认出安娜时, 不自觉地皱了皱眉, 僵硬地点了点头.

trans.tran_cn: 僵硬地，顽固地，坚硬地，生硬地
